Title: L.A. Confidential
Overview: Three detectives in the corrupt and brutal L.A. police force of the 1950s use differing methods to uncover a conspiracy behind the shotgun slayings of the patrons at an all-night diner.
Tagline: Everything is suspect... Everyone is for sale... And nothing is what it seems.
Keywords: corruption, detective, shotgun, morgue, f word, domestic violence, corpse, crime, district attorney, bandage, movie star, man with glasses, knife in thigh, good cop bad cop, switchblade, call girl, 1950s, falsifying
production_companies: Regency Enterprises, Wolper Organization, Warner Bros.
Cast: Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Danny DeVito
